info.title: CCCAMBOX Reseller API
info.description: I'm trying to write a description for the API

get.description: Retrieve the current number of credits available to the authenticated entity.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.

429.description: Rate limit error: too many requests.

post.description: Create a regular line and deduct corresponding credits based on the chosen duration.

duration.description: The duration of the line in months. Valid values are '1', '3', '6', or '12'.

username.description: The username of the line. Must be RFC 3986 compliant. If not provided, a random username will be generated.

password.description: The password of the line. Must be RFC 3986 compliant. If not provided, a random password will be generated.

connections.description: The number of simultaneous connections allowed for the line. Should be an integer between 1 and 6.

macaddress.description: The MAC address to assign to the line.

parentalCode.description: The parental code of the MAG access. Should be 4 digits.

bouquets.description: The IDs of the bouquets to link on creation of the line.

enabled.description: Specifies whether the created line should be active or not.

exp_date.description: Date of expiration of the line.

start_date.description: Starting date of the line (Creation date or Extension date if the line has been extended).

created_at.description: Initial creation date of the line.

400.description: Bad Request: Errors in supplied parameters.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.

402.description: Balance error: Your balance is insufficient to perform this action.

message.example: Insufficient balance to perform this action.

minBalance.description: The minimum balance required to perform the action

409.description: A line with this mac address or this username already exist

429.description: Rate limit error: too many requests.

get.description: Allows to fetch all details associated with a specific line.

schema.description: The ID of the line. Either the ID or the username is required to run this request.

200.description: Ok: Return all details of the specified line

exp_date.description: Date of expiration of the line.

start_date.description: Starting date of the line (Creation date or Extension date if the line has been extended).

created_at.description: Initial creation date of the line.

400.description: Bad Request: Errors in supplied parameters.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.

404.description: Line Not Found: The line you're looking for could not be found.

429.description: Rate limit error: too many requests.

id.description: The ID of the line. Either the ID or the username is required to run this request.

new_username.description: The username of the line. Must be RFC 3986 compliant. If the value is true, a random username will be generated.

password.description: The password of the line. Must be RFC 3986 compliant. If the value is true, a random password will be generated.

macaddress.description: The MAC address to assign to the line. To remove the assigned macaddress, set false

parentalCode.description: The parental code of the MAG access. Should be 4 digits. Set false to remove parental code

bouquets.description: The IDs of the bouquets to link on creation of the line. To remove bouquets, set empty array or false

enabled.description: Specifies whether the created line should be active or not.

id.description: The ID of the line. Either the ID or the username is required to run this request.

exp_date.description: Date of expiration of the line.

start_date.description: Starting date of the line (Creation date or Extension date if the line has been extended).

created_at.description: Initial creation date of the line.

400.description: Bad Request: Errors in supplied parameters.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.

404.description: Line Not Found: The line you're looking for could not be found.

409.description: A line with this mac address or this username already exist

429.description: Rate limit error: too many requests.

delete.description: Permanently delete a line from the system.

id.description: The ID of the line. Either the ID or the username is required to run this request.

400.description: Bad Request: Errors in supplied parameters.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.

404.description: Line Not Found: The line you're looking for could not be found.

429.description: Rate limit error: too many requests.

post.description: Create a trial line but does not deduct any credits.

duration.description: The duration of the line in hours. Valid values are '12', '24' or '48'.

username.description: The username of the line. Must be RFC 3986 compliant. If not provided, a random username will be generated.

password.description: The password of the line. Must be RFC 3986 compliant. If not provided, a random password will be generated.

macaddress.description: The MAC address to assign to the line.

parentalCode.description: The parental code of the MAG access. Should be 4 digits.

bouquets.description: The IDs of the bouquets to link on creation of the line.

enabled.description: Specifies whether the created line should be active or not.

exp_date.description: Date of expiration of the line.

start_date.description: Starting date of the line (Creation date or Extension date if the line has been extended).

created_at.description: Initial creation date of the line.

400.description: Bad Request: Errors in supplied parameters.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.

402.description: Balance error: Your balance is insufficient to perform this action.

message.example: Insufficient balance to perform this action.

minBalance.description: The minimum balance required to perform the action

409.description: A line with this mac address or this username already exist

429.description: Rate limit error: too many requests.

get.description: Fetch a list of all currently active lines.

schema.description: The offset for the returned lines. Should be a non-negative integer.
The number of lines to return. Should be an integer between 1 and 100.
Status of the returned lines. Possible values: 'all', 'active', 'suspended'.
Type of the line to return. Possible values: 'all', 'premium', 'trial'.
Field to sort lines by. Possible values: 'id', 'username', 'enabled', 'exp_date'.

200.description: Returns a list of active lines.

is_trial.description: Indicates whether the line is a trial. If the trial line is extended to a premium line, this field is set to false.

exp_date.description: Date of expiration of the line.

start_date.description: Starting date of the line (Creation date or Extension date if the line has been extended).

created_at.description: Initial creation date of the line.

400.description: Bad Request: Errors in supplied parameters.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.

429.description: Rate limit error: too many requests.

put.description: Associate a MAG device with a specific line.

id.description: The ID of the line. Either the ID or the username is required to run this request.

macaddress.description: The MAC address to assign to the line. To remove the assigned macaddress, set false

exp_date.description: Date of expiration of the line.

start_date.description: Starting date of the line (Creation date or Extension date if the line has been extended).

created_at.description: Initial creation date of the line.

400.description: Bad Request: Errors in supplied parameters.

message.example: Not authorized to perform this action.
